p: Spectral differences occur in the range 14761450 cm –1. In spectra of 2-hour temperature treated mixtures the middle intensity band at 1466 cm –1 accompanied by weak band at 1459 cm –1 is present. In the spectrum of 4-hour treated mixtures band at 1466 cm –1 is still present, while new band at 1457 cm –1 occurs that is considered shifted band observed at 1459 cm –1 in spectra of 2-hour temperature treated samples. The shift toward lower frequency evidences that bond generating this band is slightly weaker than original one. In the spectrum of 6-hour temperature treated sample band at 1466 cm –1 is present at the same wavenumber, while band at 1457 cm –1 becomes more distinct, i.e., is of greater intensity.
